original_text:
Rejoice, you nations, with his people,
    for he will avenge the blood of his servants;
he will take vengeance on his enemies
    and make atonement for his land and people.
korean_text: 너희 민족들아 주의 백성과 즐거워하라 주께서 그 종들의 피를 갚으사 그 대적들에게 복수하시고 자기 땅과 자기 백성을 위하여 속죄하시리로다

sentences.original_text: Rejoice, you nations, with his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 백성과 함께 즐거워하라, 모든 민족들아

sentences.original_text: for he will avenge the blood of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 종들의 피를 갚아 줄 것임이라

sentences.original_text: he will take vengeance on his enemies
and make atonement for his land and people
